General Education Requirement (21 credit.Optional General Education Courses (6 cr: Choose any two approved General Education courses (3 credits each).

Elective Courses (20 credits).requirement_note: Students must choose any six elective courses (ELTV1-ELTV6) totaling at least 20 credits. If EEE490 (Research Project) is taken, the remaining 14 credits must be completed from four elective courses.
